'''''Mallorn'' 7''' is the seventh issue of the Tolkien Society's journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in [[1973]]. It was the first issue to be published after the death of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

==Contents==

* Editorial
** Well - Er - Um - Ahem!
*** By "The Numenoreans"
** Letters to the Editor
*** By John Abbott, Jim Allan, Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]]), and Pat McIntosh
* Notes
** Namarie (obituary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]])
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
** The Geology of Middle-Earth
*** By Pat McIntosh
** The Story of the Silmarillion, Part One
*** By Jim Allan
** A Vestige of the Shire
*** By Jessica Kemball-Cook
* Creative
** The Legend of Saint Acrilan (poem)
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
** Legolas on Anduin (poem)
*** By Pat McIntosh
** Vuldathoom (short story)
*** By Gordon Larkin
** Grimhelm's Song (poem)
*** By Pat McIntosh
* Book Reviews
** ''Gold the Man'' (also known as ''The Mind Behind the Eye'') by Joseph Green
*** Reviewed by Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
** ''Stag Boy'' by William Rayner
*** Reviewed by Susan Adler
** ''The Tombs of Atuan'' by [[Ursula K. Le Guin|Ursula Le Guin]]
*** Reviewed by Jessica Kemball-Cook
** The Stuff of Fantasyâ€”From an Unlikely Source: ''Curious Myths of the Middle Ages'' by Sabine Baring-Gould
*** Reviewed by Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
